benchmark_details.name: TAAROF BENCH
benchmark_details.overview: TAAROF BENCH is the first benchmark for evaluating LLM understanding of taarof, comprising 450 role-play scenarios covering 12 common social interaction topics, validated by native speakers.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate whether LLMs understand and express taarof norms in open-ended interactions.

data.source: Data derived from cultural practices and validated scenarios by native speakers.
data.annotation: Annotated with culturally expected behavior drawn from academic and ethnographic sources.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is computed as the number of culturally appropriate model responses divided by the total number of scenarios.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better understanding and expression of taarof norms.
methodology.baseline_results: Accuracy rates ranged from 34-42% for culturally expected scenarios.
methodology.validation: Validated through evaluation against expectations by native speakers and automated assessments.
